title: Recurrence plot
summary: In descriptive statistics and chaos theory, a recurrence plot (RP) is a plot showing, for each moment i {\displaystyle i} in time, the times at which the state of a dynamical system returns to the previous state at i {\displaystyle i} , i.e., when the phase space trajectory visits roughly the same area in the phase space as at time j {\displaystyle j} . In other words, it is a plot of
